text: 33|36|allāhvum avaṉuṭaiya tūtarum oru viṣayattaip paṟṟik kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭa piṉṉar, avviṣayattil (atai viṭṭu) vēṟu apippirāyam koḷvataṟku nampikkaiyāḷarāṉa enta āṇukkum peṇṇukkum urimaiyillai. (Ivviṣayattil) allāhvukkum avaṉuṭaiya tūtarukkum evarēṉum māṟu ceytāl, niccayamāka avar pakiraṅkamāṉa vaḻikēṭṭilēyē irukkiṟār
